law.catch_line: Penalties for violation of Sections 7-24 through 7-27.

text.section:
Sec. 7-28. Penalties for violation of Sections 7-24 through 7-27.
A violation of any provision of Sections through may be punished by a fine not exceeding five hundred dollars ($500.00) or by imprisonment not exceeding sixty (60) days or both such fine and imprisonment.
